title: nIndik-karai sEra
sahitya:
nIndik-karai sEra vENDum ayyA inda nIL kaDalAghiya vAzhvin alaigaLai


anupallavi

  shAnta urudi koNDE cancalam illAmal sattuva rAjasa tAmasa guNamellAm


caraNam    Ashait-timingilangaL piDikkAmal ennai accap-pisAcugaL aDikkAmal karma
pasha shuzhalirk-kaNNIr vaDikkAmal un parama krpaiyAghiya paDaginai viDukkAmal
